set(OpenCV_DIR ${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR})
message(STATUS "OpenCV_DIR: ${OpenCV_DIR}")
find_package(OpenCV 3.4.15 QUIET)
if(OpenCV_FOUND) 
    message(STATUS "Found OpenCV ${OpenCV_VERSION}")
else()
    message(STATUS "OpenCV not found, building from source")
    include(${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/build_thirdparty/BuildOpenCV.cmake)
endif()
